questions.question: How many weeks are in one year?
questions.hint: There are 365 days in a year. How many groups of 7 days fit into 365?

questions.question: How many days are in one year?
questions.hint: Think about how many days pass from one birthday to the next!

questions.question: If it is 3:15, what time will it be in 2 hours?
questions.hint: Add the hours first. The minutes stay the same when you only add hours.

questions.question: How many hours are in 2 days?
questions.hint: One day has 24 hours. What is 24 + 24?

questions.question: What time does the clock show if the hour hand is on 7 and the minute hand is on 3?
questions.hint: The minute hand on 3 means 3 groups of 5 minutes. Count by 5s: 5, 10, ...

questions.question: How many days are in 3 weeks?
questions.hint: One week has 7 days. What is 7 + 7 + 7?

questions.question: If today is Wednesday, what day will it be in 5 days?
questions.hint: Count forward from Wednesday: Thursday (1), Friday (2), Saturday (3)...

questions.question: It is 10:30 AM. What time will it be in 1 hour and 30 minutes?
questions.hint: Add 1 hour first to get 11:30. Then add 30 more minutes.

questions.question: How many months have exactly 30 days?
questions.hint: Remember: 30 days has September, April, June, and... which other month?

questions.question: What time does the clock show if the hour hand is on 11 and the minute hand is on 6?
questions.hint: The minute hand on 6 means 6 groups of 5 minutes. What is 6 times 5?

questions.question: If it is 4:45, what time will it be in 30 minutes?
questions.hint: 45 minutes plus 30 minutes equals 75 minutes. But there are only 60 minutes in an hour!

questions.question: How many hours are in 3 days?
questions.hint: Each day has 24 hours. What is 24 + 24 + 24?

questions.question: March is the _____ month of the year.
questions.hint: Count from January: January (1), February (2), March (?).

questions.question: If today is Saturday, what day was it 3 days ago?
questions.hint: Count backward from Saturday: Friday (1 day ago), Thursday (2 days ago)...

questions.question: How many days are in 4 weeks?
questions.hint: One week has 7 days. Multiply 7 by 4.

questions.question: It is 2:40 PM. What time will it be in 25 minutes?
questions.hint: 40 + 25 = 65 minutes. Since 65 is more than 60, the hour changes!

questions.question: How many months are in one year?
questions.hint: Name them: January, February, March... keep counting until December.

questions.question: What time does the clock show if the hour hand is on 9 and the minute hand is on 9?
questions.hint: The minute hand pointing to 9 means 9 groups of 5 minutes. What is 9 x 5?

questions.question: If school starts at 8:00 AM and ends at 3:00 PM, how many hours is the school day?
questions.hint: Count the hours from 8: 9, 10, 11, 12, 1, 2, 3. How many did you count?

questions.question: How many days are in 5 weeks?
questions.hint: Each week has 7 days. What is 5 x 7?

questions.question: It is 6:50 AM. What time will it be in 20 minutes?
questions.hint: 50 + 20 = 70 minutes. Remember, 70 minutes = 1 hour and 10 minutes.

questions.question: November is the _____ month of the year.
questions.hint: September is 9, October is 10, November is...

questions.question: How many minutes are in 2 hours?
questions.hint: One hour has 60 minutes. What is 60 + 60?

questions.question: If a movie starts at 7:15 PM and is 2 hours long, what time does it end?
questions.hint: Add 2 hours to 7:15. The minutes stay the same when adding full hours.

questions.question: How many days are in 2 weeks?
questions.hint: One week has 7 days. What is 7 + 7?

questions.question: What time does the clock show if the hour hand is on 4 and the minute hand is on 12?
questions.hint: When the minute hand points to 12, it means exactly on the hour.

questions.question: If it is 11:45 AM, what time will it be in 30 minutes?
questions.hint: 45 + 30 = 75 minutes. That is 1 hour and 15 minutes. Add to 11:00.

questions.question: How many weeks are in 28 days?
questions.hint: How many groups of 7 fit into 28? Try dividing 28 by 7.

questions.question: June is the _____ month of the year.
questions.hint: April is 4th, May is 5th, June is...

questions.question: It is 1:35 PM. What time will it be in 45 minutes?
questions.hint: 35 + 45 = 80 minutes. That is 1 hour and 20 minutes.

questions.question: How many days are in February during a regular year?
questions.hint: February is the shortest month. In most years, it has how many days?

questions.question: If today is the 15th of the month, what date was it one week ago?
questions.hint: One week = 7 days. Subtract 7 from 15.

questions.question: What time does the clock show if the hour hand is between 2 and 3, and the minute hand is on 6?
questions.hint: If the hour hand is between 2 and 3, the hour is 2. The minute hand on 6 means 30 minutes.

questions.question: How many hours are in half a day?
questions.hint: A full day has 24 hours. What is half of 24?

questions.question: It is 9:20 AM. What time was it 35 minutes ago?
questions.hint: Go back in time! 20 minutes - 35 minutes means borrowing from the hour.

questions.question: How many months have 31 days?
questions.hint: January, March, May, July, August, October, December. Count them!

questions.question: If class starts at 9:15 and lasts for 45 minutes, what time does class end?
questions.hint: 15 + 45 = 60 minutes. 60 minutes equals 1 full hour!

questions.question: What day comes 10 days after Monday?
questions.hint: 10 days = 1 week (7 days) + 3 more days. Count 3 days after Monday.

questions.question: How many minutes are in 1 hour and 30 minutes?
questions.hint: Convert 1 hour to minutes first (60 minutes), then add the extra 30.

questions.question: If it takes 15 minutes to walk to school, and school starts at 8:00 AM, what is the latest time you should leave home?
questions.hint: Work backward from 8:00 AM. Subtract the walking time.
